q: How do I enroll in a course?
a: Open the Course List, choose a course, then click **Enroll Now**. Your enrollments appear under **My Enrollments**.

q: Where do I see assignments and submit work?
a: Open the course → **Assignments** section. Each assignment shows the deadline and an **Upload/Submit** button.
Payments are processed securely via Stripe. You’ll see fees at checkout before confirming the payment.
From the course page, click **Start/Resume** to open the **Player**. Your progress is saved automatically.

q: How do I contact the instructor?
a: Open the course page and view the **Instructor** section. If messaging is enabled, you'll see a **Contact Instructor** option.
